BRANCH.COMMENT: Check if zip file is successfully created

The archived files were deleted successfully.
Either there were no files to delete or Following files were not deleted because of unknown reason. %notDeletedFileList%
The archive service failed creating the file at %targetDirectory% because - %output% for files of type %fileTypeList%
